Static command

  • command(__namedParameters?: object): PromiseWithEvents<any[]>
    • Defined in docker-compose.ts:24

    Allows the running of any abritary docker Can be used to manage changes to the docker CLI

    static
    memberof

    Docker

    Parameters

    • Default value __namedParameters: object = {}
      • command: undefined | string

        the command to run, do not supply for an argment only command such as "docker -v"

      • commandArguments: any
      • composeFilepath: undefined | string | string[]

        The path to the compose YAML

      • dockerComposeOptions: undefined | IDockerComposeOptions
      • spawnOptions: undefined | SpawnOptions

        options to control how the child shell process is managed

      • useStdIo: undefined | true | false

    Returns PromiseWithEvents<any[]>

    • the promise use ".on('stdout', (line: any) => { .... })" to get immediate feedback from stdout
